headline: Corebridge Financial Announces Pricing of Secondary Offering of Common Stock by AIG
summary: HOUSTON, November 08, 2024--Corebridge Financial, Inc. (NYSE: CRBG) today announced that the previously announced secondary offering by American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) of common stock of Corebridge Financial has priced at $31.20 per share. The offering is expected to close on November 12, 2024, subject to customary closing conditions.
